briefdescription.para: This function is used to initial i2s port.

parameterdescription.para: the i2s setting options,if this param is NULL,this function will use the default options.

WM_FAILED

WM_SUCCESS

parameterdescription.para: The value set to Rx threshold level
The value set to Tx threshold level

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable receiver of I2S module.

parameterdescription.para: When one enable the receiver of I2S module, when zero disable

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the specified I2S interrupts.

parameterdescription.para:
specifies the I2S interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be one of the following values:
I2S_INT_MASK_LZC
I2S_INT_MASK_RZC
I2S_INT_MASK_TXDONE
I2S_INT_MASK_TXTH
I2S_INT_MASK_TXOV
I2S_INT_MASK_TXUD
I2S_INT_MASK_RXDONE
I2S_INT_MASK_RXTH
I2S_INT_MASK_RXOV
I2S_INT_MASK_RXUD
when set ,enable interrupt, zero disabled

detaileddescription.para:
clock
The target MCLK clock rate.
actual
MCLK clock rate
Set the master clock rate according to u32BusClock parameter and enable master clock output. The actual master clock rate may be different from the target master clock rate. The real master clock rate will be returned for reference.
